channel.title: Proggy - My New Pure
channel.description:
[center]Progress Page Number One Okay, me and my brother did all the requirements to do monkey madness today…and I woke up early. Rather than being a di** and doing it, I decided to make a progress page instead for my pure. Our current goals are 82 Mage, 80 Range, 52 Prayer, 1 Defence, 99 Strength, and 60 Attack. These are all long term goals, and we will not exactly….hardcore them. Also, as a side thing, we are going to get 50 in all skill-stats. Well, here it goes… Money Making: To make money, we’ve been flipping. Basically, after every penny we make, my brother gives it to me and I flip any good PK items. It’s good cash, and takes no effort. If you want a good flipping suggestion, I suggest abyssal whips, berserker rings, and any PK item in high demand with a reasonable price. We had the delusion that we would be level three flower gamers, which is why these accounts have lots of cash…we flower gamed 24/7. It was not worth it. BANK [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/34r9gqw.png[/img] CASH PILE [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ly2984.png[/img]
Training: To train, I’ve basically been doing experiments and quests. Range is the only skill I’ve really worked on, the others are the product of quests I’ve done…I mean who would train their attack higher than their strength? =D STATS [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/mhf3aa.png[/img] TOTAL XP: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2vvusyb.png[/img] QUESTS [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/ndu3o6.png[/img] QUESTS FOR THE FUTURE [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/aew8b8.png[/img] So…it would be appreciated if you left comment such as… “Good Job!” “Keep Up The Good Work!” “If I Were You, I Would Have Done So-and-So Differently…”
Thanks For Reading![/center]

item.title: Proggy - My New Pure
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Turmoilz1337x:

One: According to a P-Mod I talked to, pures will still be just effective in combat. It will still be same for example…40 atk 40 def vs. 80 str.

How would a P-Mod know anything the average player wouldn’t?

Read full topic

item.title: Proggy - My New Pure
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

I want to see how my pure will compare to others after the update.

Read full topic

item.title: Proggy - My New Pure
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:15, topic:451192”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=554078.msg4061474#msg4061474 date=1343461289]
I honestly think people who are currently pures should consider becoming tank rangers. You can lure with them, which is a lot of fun (but maybe not necessary anymore if they overhaul single/multi combat areas).
[/quote]

I have a range tank and the update is going to be hell for me. With 91 range and 84 def, ill be a level 176, when currently I’m only 101 or something. Who’s to say someone with 99 str, attack, mage, range and 77 def won’t take me on? It’s rather awkward for my level.[/quote]
I’m a 128 atm and I’ll be a level 177 so apparently we’d be a good match up xD.
I’m 95 att 97 str 98 mage 99 range 89 summon 95 pray 76 def xDD.

Read full topic

I honestly think people who are currently pures should consider becoming tank rangers. You can lure with them, which is a lot of fun (but maybe not necessary anymore if they overhaul single/multi combat areas).

I have a range tank and the update is going to be hell for me. With 91 range and 84 def, ill be a level 176, when currently I’m only 101 or something. Who’s to say someone with 99 str, attack, mage, range and 77 def won’t take me on? It’s rather awkward for my level.

item.title: Proggy - My New Pure
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“ciaran6889, post:11, topic:451192”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=554078.msg4060932#msg4060932 date=1343415328]

One: According to a P-Mod I talked to, pures will still be just effective in combat. It will still be same for example…40 atk 40 def vs. 80 str.

Two: I was remote accessed, shut down, and hacked last night Fagex refuses to do anything to roll me back.

40 atk 40 def can have like 10x the lp of the pure.
[/quote]
not very likely but with soul wars and stuff like that yeah[/quote]

What? I’m talking about EoC, not current RS. The more defensive bonus you have in armor, the higher your LP is.

Read full topic
